record.name: Arrival-Date
record.description: date/time the original message was received

record.name: Auth-Failure
record.description: Type of email authentication method failure

record.name: Authentication-Results
record.description: results of authentication check(s)

record.name: Delivery-Result
record.description: Final disposition of the subject message

record.name: DKIM-ADSP-DNS
record.description: Retrieved DKIM ADSP record

record.name: DKIM-Canonicalized-Body
record.description: Canonicalized body, per DKIM

record.name: DKIM-Canonicalized-Header
record.description: Canonicalized header, per DKIM

record.name: DKIM-Domain
record.description: DKIM signing domain from "d=" tag

record.name: DKIM-Identity
record.description: Identity from DKIM signature

record.name: DKIM-Selector
record.description: Selector from DKIM signature

record.name: DKIM-Selector-DNS
record.description: Retrieved DKIM key record

record.name: Feedback-Type
record.description: registered feedback report type

record.name: Incidents
record.description: expression of how many similar incidents are represented by this report

record.name: Original-Mail-From
record.description: email address used in the MAIL FROM portion of the original SMTP transaction

record.name: Original-Rcpt-To
record.description: email address used in the RCPT TO portion of the original SMTP transaction

record.name: Received-Date
record.description: date/time the original message was received (replaced by "Arrival-Date")

record.name: Reported-Domain
record.description: a domain name the report generator considers to be key to the message about which a report is being generated

record.name: Reported-URI
record.description: a URI the report generator considers to be key to the message about which a report is being generated

record.name: Reporting-MTA
record.description: MTA generating this report

record.name: Source-IP
record.description: IPv4 or IPv6 address from which the original message was received

record.name: SPF-DNS
record.description: Retrieved SPF record

record.name: User-Agent
record.description: name and version of the program generating the report

record.name: Version
record.description: version of specification used

record.name: Source-Port
record.description: TCP source port from which the original message was received

record.name: Identity-Alignment
record.description: indicates whether the message about which a report is being generated had any identifiers in alignment as defined in

record.name: abuse
record.description: unsolicited email or some other kind of email abuse

record.name: auth-failure
record.description: email authentication failure report

record.name: fraud
record.description: indicates some kind of fraud or phishing activity

record.name: not-spam
record.description: Indicates that the entity providing the report does not consider the message to be spam. This may be used to correct a message that was incorrectly tagged or categorized as spam.

record.name: other
record.description: any other feedback that does not fit into other registered types

record.name: virus
record.description: report of a virus found in the originating message
